text: Lance LeGault (William Lance Legault, May 2, 1935 - September 10, 2012) was an American movie, television, and voice actor. He was known for his many television roles, mostly in The A-Team. He was born in Chicago, Illinois.Column in The Robesonian He was married to Theresa LeGault from 1984 until his death in 2012. They had four children. He died on September 10, 2012 in his home in Los Angeles, California from unknown causes. He was 77 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Lance LeGault
